name: JOSEFA BUIL, juego de espías
description:
This game was developed during z-jam 2020, using SPANISH language ingame

The game Jam topic was "Great women", so the idea was showing the user the story of Josefa Buil, a woman from Zaragoza(Spain) who created a spy net during the independence spanish war against the French invasion in the early 1800's.

The game goes around this character, and it mixes the idea of delivering secret messages to spies at the same time you work on a bar serving food and drinks to normal people. A hard double life for a woman during those times.

The controls are as following:

Arrow keys | awsd keys | joystick left pad: move the character

Ctrl | left mouse click | joystick first fire button: pick & drop items

I invite you to Play it and leave some feedback.

Thanks in advance
